member.exception: Throws when the puzzle is not solved.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Transforming.GridTransformations.SwapHouse(Sudoku.Concepts.Grid@,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.exception: Throws when two specified house argument is not in valid range (0..27), two houses are not in same house type, or are not swappable.
member.remarks: This method will return the reference that is same as the argument , in order to inline multiple transformation operations.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Transforming.GridTransformations.SwapChute(Sudoku.Concepts.Grid@,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: The first chute to be swapped.
The second chute to be swapped.
member.exception: Throws when two specified chute index is not in valid range (0..6).

para.i: This type is marked , which means you can use | to combine multiple fields.
